ruleSummaries.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3. The metadata stream dictionary shall contain entry Type with value /Metadata and entry Subtype with value /XML
